title: Instagram-clone
description: A full-stack social media application inspired by Instagram, built using React for the frontend and MongoDB for backend data storage. The project includes user authentication, post creation, image uploading, and interactive user interface features to simulate a real-world social media experience.

title: Fake Account Detection UI
description: A responsive frontend interface built using React that helps visualize and manage fake account detection workflows. The application provides a clean dashboard layout, user-friendly navigation, and dynamic components to display account analysis results efficiently.

title: Productivity Dashboard UI
description: A modern and responsive productivity dashboard built to help users manage tasks, track progress, and visualize productivity data. The application focuses on clean UI design, interactive components, and smooth user experience for monitoring daily workflow and performance insights.

title: :Netflix UI clone
description: A visually appealing frontend clone inspired by Netflix, built using HTML and CSS. The project focuses on replicating the streaming platform's layout, banner sections, movie rows, and responsive design while maintaining clean styling and structured UI components.

title: :Sheryians coding school
description: A responsive frontend website inspired by Sheryians Coding School, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on modern UI design, structured layouts, and interactive elements to create an engaging and user-friendly learning platform interface.
